name: foundered
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
founder
(especially of a boat) to fill with water and sink: The ferry foundered in a heavy storm, taking many of the passengers and crew with it.
to be unsuccessful: Teaching computers to read and write has always foundered on the unpredictable human element in language.
